title: Himi 474
lyrics:
8.4.8.4.8.8.8.4.
Ko e Saame 23.
1.
Hoku tauhi ‘a Sihova,
‘Oiau he ofa!
‘E ‘ikai te u tuēnoa,
‘Oiau he ‘ofa!
Te Ne kumi hoku hala,
Poupou ‘i he faingata’a,
Teuteu ‘a e keinanga’anga,
‘Oiau he ‘ofa!
2.
Ko e sipi au a’ana
‘Oiau he ‘ofa!
Na’a ku afe mei he hala,
‘Oiau he ‘ofa!
Na’a ku hola ‘o mama’o,
Ka Ne kumi au he vao,
Kumi pō ‘o kumi ‘aho,
‘Oiau he ‘ofa!
3.
Na’a Ne kīkītaki atu,
‘Oiau he ‘ofa!
Na’a Ne tuli pē ke maʻu,
‘Oiau he ‘ofa!
Na’a Ne hanga pē ‘o fua,
Hilifaki hono uma,
Fai he la’ā mo e ‘uha,
‘Oiau he ‘ofa!
4.
‘Oi ‘ete tau ki monū ni!
‘Oiau he ‘ofa!
Ngoue ē lau muimui!
‘Oiau he ʻofa!
Inu he vai fakanonga,
Tali ‘ene folofola,
Mātā si’ono fofonga,
‘Oiau he ‘ofa!*
